column1: 63804806$Supersonic Skull Flame$Unlimited$WIND$[Zombie/Effect]$$$$$10$2600$2000$$$$This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 "Skull Flame" from your Graveyard. Once per turn
column2: you can inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each "Burning Skull Head" in your Graveyard. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard

column2: you can Special Summon 1 "Burning Skull Head" from your hand. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect.
